channel.title: Set up your environment on TIBCO Cloud Integration - Flogo
channel.description: Recent content in Set up your environment on TIBCO Cloud Integration - Flogo

item.title: Using Goland
item.description: To use Golandas your IDE to develop extensions for TIBCO Cloud™Integration - Flogo®or TIBCO Flogo®Enterprise, you can install a few extensions to make your life easier. Goland native supports Go. Install plugins for typescript. You can install Angular and Angular JS plugins from Goland Marketpace.

item.title: Using VS Code
item.description: To use Microsoft Visual Studio Code as your IDE to develop extensions for TIBCO Cloud™Integration - Flogo®orTIBCO Flogo®Enterprise you can install a few extensions to make your life easier. Install the Go extension from the extensions marketplace in Visual Studio Code. Visual Studio Code uses the variables set on your machine and will ask you to install an additional set of analysis tools. These tools make developing Go projects in VSCode a lot easier.
